author: clr
msg: Please review and update this for the April board report

author: stack
msg: Don't log to stdout the fact that we're in safe mode...
only does it once so user thinks we've actually exited
safe mode when we could be stuck waiting on it.  Force

author: stack
msg: Don't log to STDOUT -- confuses; gives impression we've left safe mode
when we haven't.  Force user look in logs.  Will get a better picture
why we're not coming up (if its because we're stuck in safe mode)

author: oysteing
msg: DERBY-3551: Handle normallyy unlogged operations (create index, import) during replication
1. If unlogged operations are running when replication is started, throw an error.
2. If normally unlogged operations are started when replication is running, turn on logging.
